newsitem.title: FINLAND: ELCOTEQ SAYS UPS PRINTEQ STAKE TO 91 PCT.
newsitem.headline: ELCOTEQ SAYS UPS PRINTEQ STAKE TO 91 PCT.

text.p: Finnish electronics component maker Elcoteq said on Thursday its holding in chip maker Printeq-Piirilevyt Oy rose to 91 percent after it acquired 40 percent of Printeq-Piirilevyt's shares from telecoms group Nokia Oy .
"After the deal, Elcoteq holds 91 percent and Nokia Mobile Phones nine percent of shares in Printeq," Elcoteq said in a statement.
The price of the deal was not disclosed.
